评论详情: I wear a 33/34 waist and although this did fit around the waist. It was SUPER tight around the calves. If you have skinny calves these will work however I have other jogger pants that fit much better with the same size.
The first time I bought an xl, they fit my son perfect. So I ordered two more. These are way too baggy and long. Looks to be about 4” longer and 2” to wide. Other than that these are great.
The pants were a gift, but had to be returned due to the fact that they were too tight at the calf.  Fit well other than that, and a nice material.  But had to return them.

Great fit and color.
My son loved how well done and thick the material is. True to size
These do run a little small. I recommend sizing up.

I ordered 3 pairs in all different colors (gray, khaki, and green). For whatever reason the gray ones are like 4 inches longer than the gray ones. The other two fit great but the gray ones are just too long. I’m 5’10 and weigh 185—ordered medium for all three and they were great. Happy with the other two.

Looks nice, goes with basically anything. Feels nice, roomy and fabric is soft against my skin.  It does however show the wear m tear quickly. The washing shows up on the material quickly....
These pants say for tall, waist fits fine but length is 4” short.

These are good quality and fit true to size. Ignore the bad reviews these are the ones you want! Cuff is not too tight and legs have enough room to move around comfortably. Will definitely order more as needed.
These pants are so comfortable and fit so well that my husband bought himself another pair.

Although the fabric and construction looked nice, the fit was very strange. My son is 6'3" and thin. The calves were super tight and not quite long enough while the torso area was too large and baggy. We returned these.
Good fit, comfort, and quality.
They fit a size 52 waist. I have plenty of leg room and the strechy material is perfect for the thick thighs a guy my size has. Hooray, cause not all fat guys are short! RECOMMENDED!!!
I normally wear an XL (6'4" - 265).  Based on other comments I ordered a 3XL. It sorta fits.  The calfs are tight (what do we have chicken legs?).  The fabric is ok. This is just sizing gone wild.

Anyway, the only downside is my phone will fall out of these pockets every time i sit down, so I stopped keeping my phone in my pants pocket with these on. The pockets need to be made different, but the pants look and feel great overall, I love them.
Bought three in the same size. All three were different. This was the only pair I can keep. Comfy enough. Good luck if you order. Probably won't buy more.

These are my favorite pants. I finally have 8 pairs. I’m on the spectrum and it is hard to find pants I like. These are perfect. I like how they feel when I wear them. They fit just like pants should. Hopefully they sell these forever so I don’t have to find new pants.

At 6’5 and nearly 350lbs, it’s tough to find pants that fit and feel good. These were my primary pants for a trip to Europe with lots of walking and hiking in the fall. Pockets are deep enough to hold the essentials. Fit is great, maybe a big larger than competitors. Highly recommend!

The pants themselves are great, but I ordered two pairs, both large, and they are completely different sizes. One is 4-5 inches longer, but both tags say large. If I hadn’t have ordered two pairs I would have never known.

For reference he regularly wears between a 38 and 42 X 36 or 38 depending on the brand of jeans.

Nice pair of pants. I’m a 5’9 female and they weren’t baggy

评论概述: Casual comfort while looking semi professional
评论详情: Bought multiple pairs of these pants to wear to work and am quite pleased with them. I am 6'3" and the size large fit me well without looking like I have high water pants on. It is always a bonus to have back pockets in joggers, which I was happy to find these did.  Sitting down, things can fall out of your pocket easily, so keep that in mind. After a wash, they also slightly shrunk some, so be mindful of that.

These are nice but are a lint magnet if you are purchasing black, and I even got a second pair in a different color and they collect hair and lint too, but it is not as noticeable. The draw string also should have a ring where the holes are because I ripped mine by accident when I tried to tighten them.
Kinda baggy. Size 32. I like my joggers to hug a bit more

I ordered the black, tan, and olive colors in XL (6'0, ~200 lbs). The olive and tan fit the same through the waist, thighs, and calf (and feel good), but the black felt larger (they feel still good though). Just questioning the consistency in sizing here.

My daughter absolutely love these. They stretch and are extremly comfortable yet, the fabric is breathable and not too heavy. we ordered them in every color. She gets so may compliments! Definitely a must buy!

Fabric is great, love the fit, style and quality. Would definitely recommend purchasing.

Bought two pair of pants from this company and received one pair and the other pair will be estimated 10 days shipping time which seems like it’s coming from a drop shipper and I needed both pair for Father’s Day and today is June 19. I would have preferred more expensive cost and got them both on time. As for the pants they are straight forward nothing special about them.

I'm about 5'9 and ordered the medium, there is so much extra material around the crotch and butt area for my height . I could literally pull them up to my rib area and still be around my ankles at the bottom. Don't see myself wearing them outside of the house pretty much a waste of money.

These so called scrubs are absolutely terrible! The material is so thick and heavy! Scrubs do not feel this way. The way they feel on my body is harsh! Please don’t waste your money! I’m serious! Worst thing I’ve ever purchased from Amazon!!!

Damn. these things are fresh. alot of women admired me when i wore these out. exactly what i expected/ intended to wear. a comfortable but stylish fit, a hard cloth material, not as hard as jeans but not as soft as sweats. these things are perfect i feel like i got lucky. i heard the other colors have wear dimensions, but white is a safe one. can't wait to wear these again. theyre super comfy and fresh with a black T

Update*** August 20 The olive green joggers ripped in the middle area. I've only work them 12 times since purchased and they didn't hold up. Kinda disappointed and hoping the other pairs don't occur as well.  Update*** Jun 14, 2024 I bought khaki, grey, and olive green colors. First thing I noticed is that the sizing for all are very different and do not fit well. Khaki 3xl runs smaller and tighter vs a 3xl black. Olive green 3xl is a correct size and fit. 3xl grey runs a bit long, like about 3 inches longer then the other joggers.  Jun 5, 2024 So the joggers are definitely a size up, I got a 3xl and it fits well. My only issue is the back of the pants by the butt beacsue it has more lenght or its just extra material. But its left over that is not sitting well with my butt that it just makes noises when you walk. However it is a bit loose at the bottom which is okay for me, but the thigh part is not so loose but is also not so snug. I am 6'2 so the length of the pants are okay with me. The joggers feel very cheap and the stitching is somewhat questionable. But they are doing well for the prise. I also purchased 3xl Tall but they where just to baggy for me that I returned them.
i love these pants. perfect fit, material feels durable and good quality, and probably some of my most comfortable pants. definitely gonna grab some more when i get the chance!
Quality and affordable
